author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...EXPECTED TO TURN TOWARD THE NORTHWEST AND RESTRENGTHEN THIS WEEKEND...
summary:
...HONE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...EXPECTED TO TURN TOWARD THE NORTHWEST AND RESTRENGTHEN THIS WEEKEND...
 As of 5:00 PM HST Thu Aug 29
 the center of Hone was located near 21.5, -173.3
 with movement W at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
